channel.title: My friends can't connect
channel.description: So i made a rsps, i port forwarded and used no-ip. i also made a rule with my firewall allowing players to join. i don't get why their client stays at 1%. please help me, i changed the ip's to "lostpvp.no-ip.org" my no-ip. i've tried to use my ip address also. i can not figure out this problem PLEASE HELP ME. Add me on skype nathan.christle

item.title: My friends can't connect
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

if the client came with a cache they will need that also, otherwise your autocache download link is broken

Read full topic

item.title: My friends can't connect
item.dc:creator: @yngwieman yngwieman
item.description:
@yngwieman wrote:

So i made a rsps, i port forwarded and used no-ip. i also made a rule with my firewall allowing players to join. i don’t get why their client stays at 1%. please help me, i changed the ip’s to “lostpvp.no-ip.org” my no-ip. i’ve tried to use my ip address also. i can not figure out this problem PLEASE HELP ME. Add me on skype nathan.christle
